archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.7.4f: f) IT specialists (e.g. helpdesk staff or system administrators) should be trained in how to run systems correctly and apply required security controls effectively.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
